# Vireo

> AI-powered video editor that turns raw clips into viral-ready reels instantly

## What is Vireo?

Vireo is a web-based AI video editor designed to help creators make viral TikToks, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts without any editing skills. Upload your clips, choose a vibe, and Vireo automatically creates beat-synced, professionally edited short-form videos.

## Key Features

- **AI-Powered Editing**: Automatically selects the best moments from your clips
- **Beat Synchronization**: Syncs video cuts to music beats for viral impact
- **Multiple Vibes**: Choose from Party, Nostalgia, Cute, Hardcore, Lovey Dovey, or 2025 Throwback styles
- **One-Click Creation**: No editing experience required
- **Platform-Ready**: Outputs optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts

## Use Cases

- Turn vacation clips into travel reels
- Create memory compilations from events
- Make viral content for social media growth
- Transform raw footage into shareable stories

## Pricing

- Free tier: 2 video generations
- Premium: Unlimited lifetime access for $1 USD

## Website

https://editvireo.com
